UPDATE t_huiyuan SET password = #{password} where id = #{id}
UPDATE t_huiyuan SET tel = #{tel} where id =#{id}

UPDATE t_huiyuan SET xingming = #{xingming},user_name = #{userName},xingbie = #{xingbie},sr = #{sr} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT sum( CASE WHEN zt='待付款' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS dfksum, sum( CASE WHEN zt='待发货' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS dfhsum, sum( CASE WHEN zt='待收货' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS dshsum, sum( CASE WHEN zt='待评价' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS dpj FROM t_order WHERE del='0' AND huiyuan_id=#{id}

SELECT id, xingming, user_name AS userName, code, user_bz AS userBz, tx, sr, tel, email, address, xingbie
FROM t_huiyuan WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id FROM t_huiyuan WHERE user_name = #{userName} and password = #{password}
SELECT * FROM t_address WHERE user_id=#{id} and del_flag = '0'
SELECT id, bianhao, xiadanshi, zt, songhuodizhi, fukuanfangshi, zongjia, huiyuan_id AS huiyuanId FROM t_order

SELECT g.id, g.leibieId, g.mingcheng, g.jieshao, g.fujian, g.jiage, g.tejia, g.shifoutejia, g.del, g.fbid
FROM t_goods g INNER JOIN t_order_detail tod ON tod.goods_id = g.id WHERE tod.order_id = #{id}
